trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Gir dataene for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded"> </xref> hendelse for en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded> event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded>inntreffer bare når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontrollen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>-egenskap er satt eller tilhørende <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: Handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded> event is useful when you want to determine the error for a cell depending on its value or state.
trans-unit.target: Behandling av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded>hendelsen er nyttig når du vil finne feil for en celle avhengig av verdien eller tilstand.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: When you handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded> event and specify error text in the handler, an error glyph appears in the cell unless the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellErrors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to `false` or the cell is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Når du håndtere den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded>hendelsen, og angi feilteksten i et behandlingsprogram symbol en feil vises i cellen med mindre den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellErrors%2A?displayProperty=fullName>er satt til `false` eller cellen er i redigeringsmodus.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellErrors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: When the user moves the mouse pointer over the error glyph, the error text appears in a ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: Når brukeren flytter pekeren over tegnet feil, vises feilteksten i et verktøytips.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded> event also occurs whenever the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is retrieved.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded>hendelsen oppstår også når verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen hentes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A> property to determine the state or value of a cell, and use this information to change or modify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellErrorTextNeededEventArgs.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A>til å fastsette tilstanden eller verdien til en celle, og bruke denne informasjonen til å endre eller endre den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellErrorTextNeededEventArgs.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellErrorTextNeededEventArgs.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized with the value of the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A> property, which the event value overrides.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er initialisert med verdien i cellen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A>egenskapen hendelsen overstyre.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded> event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A> value for multiple cells.
trans-unit.target: Behandle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded>hendelsen når du arbeider med store mengder data å unngå ytelse bestemmelser stille cellen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A>verdien for flere celler.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [anbefalte fremgangsmåter for skalering i Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the message that is displayed when the cell is selected.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir meldingen som vises når cellen er merket.

trans-unit.source: This property initially contains the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property if it has been set for a row.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen i utgangspunktet inneholder verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen Hvis det er angitt for en rad.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The ErrorText property value displays as a ToolTip for the error glyph in the cell.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapsverdien ErrorText vises som et verktøytips for feil tegnet i cellen.
